changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION collection_get_next_id( collectionID int, amount int ) RETURNS TABLE ( low_reserved_id int, high_reserved_id int ) LANGUAGE sql AS $$ UPDATE collection_sequence SET counter = counter + amount WHERE collection_id = collectionID RETURNING (SELECT (counter - amount + 1) AS low_reserved_id), (SELECT counter AS high_reserved_id) $$;

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO collection_sequence VALUE (SELECT id, 0 FROM collection);
